titles.title: To eliminate a maximum daily diversion restriction with respect to the pumping of certain water from Lake Powell, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Late Referral to the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations (Nov 21, 94).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-802.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 448.

bill.summary: 9/12/1994--Introduced. Amends the Reclamation Development Act of 1974 to eliminate a maximum daily water diversion restriction with respect to the pumping of water from Lake Powell, Arizona.
